title: Innovative Instructional Design for Analyzing Changes in University Student Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Training program where pre-service teachers analyze factors influencing learner satisfaction using university environmental data and design innovative instructional strategies based on findings

learning_goals: Learners can construct and interpret latent growth models using three years of virtual university satisfaction data.
Learners can analyze correlations between course characteristics (teaching method types, instructor beliefs, etc.) and satisfaction changes.
Learners can identify low-satisfaction course characteristics and write reports proposing improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
